title: The Water Queen
description: Beloved by a god...cursed for eternity.Only the most beautiful maidens in the Kingdom are chosen to become Water Childes--mortals turned to mermaids, handmaidens to Poseidon, Lord of the Sea.When Poseidon marks sixteen year old Gaia Baratheos as his future queen, she sees it as a curse. Gaia longs for a life of adventure and thrill like the stories found in her favorite books. Unless she finds another route, all paths lead to the sea...and a god who wants her for his own.
author: Patricia  Williams
